allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Protocol workbench save/export and schema import functionality

Resolves multiple protocol workbench issues:

1. Fixed save draft/export buttons not working on Protocol Document tab
   - Moved event listeners from SchemaEditor to ProtocolWorkbenchCore top level
   - Now works on all tabs \(Protocol, Schema, Dependencies, Audit\)

2. Fixed schema import "require is not defined" error
   - Replaced require\(\) calls with proper ES module imports
   - Import validateAndImportSchema and generateNestedJSON from utils

3. Fixed protocol loading from library
   - Added state management for protocol/version IDs in ResearchFactoryApp
   - Pass IDs to ProtocolWorkbench component on navigation
   - Protocol library now properly loads selected protocol in workbench

4. Schema blocks removal/settings/dependencies working correctly
   - BlockToolbar buttons are visible on hover \(intentional UX design\)
   - All handlers properly wired through component hierarchy

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
